p08_get_dischg_position¶

Phenotyping.p08_get_dischg_position(encounter)¶

This function is used to category discharge disposition into three classes including ‘Dead’ (hospital dead), ‘Home/Rehab’ and ‘ANOTHER HOSPITAL/LTAC/SNF/HOSPICE’.

Parameters

encounter (pandas.DataFrame) – encounter dataframe, must contain following following columns: * dischg_disposition * hospital_mortality

Returns

encounter – dataframe with newly generated column ‘dischg_place’

Return type

pandas.Dataframe

Previous topic

p08_generateTrajectory

Next topic

p09_merge_outputfile
